amendment.description: To restore funding for Corps of Engineers environmental programs to fiscal year 2005 levels.

vote.text: Amendment SA 224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 224 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S2836; text: CR S2836) To restore funding for Corps of Engineers environmental programs to fiscal year 2005 levels.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 224 proposed by Senator Vitter.
